description: Enable Empathy Ledger to be the source of truth for stories with consent management. External apps (JusticeHub, Curious Tractor, etc.) access approved stories via Supabase with proper consent controls. Storytellers maintain approval rights through Empathy Ledger.

description: When audio uploaded, trigger transcription (Whisper API or Deepgram). Store transcript in transcripts table linked to story. Show processing status to field worker.

title: Enhance multi-tenant organization dashboard
description: Enhance multi-tenant organization dashboard with improved analytics, member management, and project oversight capabilities.

title: Audio recorder with live recording and upload
description: Add audio recording component to capture flow. Record directly on phone, upload to Supabase storage. Show recording duration, pause/resume, stop. Link audio file to story record.

title: Implement flexible story syndication with instant revocation
description: Build flexible story syndication system with multiple distribution methods (oEmbed, API, widgets, ActivityPub) while maintaining storyteller sovereignty - instant revocation propagates to all platforms. Follows CARE principles and Voice of Witness ethical storytelling framework.

title: Implement context optimization strategy
description: Implement context management strategy: use /clear between major tasks, prefer grep/search over reading large files, target specific sections rather than full file reads, manual /compact at strategic breakpoints.

title: Build initial gold empathy and safety eval sets (≥50 examples each)
description: Create tests/evals/empathy/ with versioned JSONL datasets. Include good vs poor empathy responses tied to transcript snippets. Label empathy score (0-5), safety flags, required citations. Mirror in Supabase with RLS.

description: ProfileDashboard.tsx is 1,221 lines and needs targeted optimization. Focus on extracting specific reusable components rather than wholesale splitting. Maintain full functionality while improving maintainability.

description: Create /profile/sharing page for storytellers to manage per-app consent

title: Define eval thresholds for empathy and safety gates
description: Specify initial baseline thresholds for CI eval gates: empathy score minimum (e.g. ≥3.5/5), hallucination rate max (e.g. <5%), citation coverage, refusal accuracy. These gate npm run test:eval.

title: Review and improve cultural safety moderation system
description: Review the cultural safety moderation system for Indigenous communities. Ensure protocols, approval workflows, and consent management are properly implemented with cultural sensitivity.
